meanings.definition: Covered in or full of mucus or nasal discharge.
meanings.sent1: The toddler's face was the snottiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The tissue was used to clean the snottiest nose in the room.
meanings.sent3: The snottiest tissue decided to take a leap off the table.
meanings.sent4: The pond looked like the snottiest swamp after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The snottiest slime trail led us to the hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: Displaying an attitude of superiority or arrogance.
meanings.sent1: She gave me the snottiest look when I asked a question.
meanings.sent2: The snottiest student in class always acted like they knew everything.
meanings.sent3: The snottiest cat refused to play with the other pets.
meanings.sent4: His snottiest behavior made it hard for others to approach him.
meanings.sent5: The snottiest boss made everyone feel small in the office.
